policies:
🌿 **sacred policies & haus boundaries**




hello, hi there lovely soul ✨




thank you for being here and trusting me with your beauty ritual. to keep our energies peaceful & aligned, I’ve created these heartfelt policies. they’re simply here to hold space, protect our energy, time, and ensure every visit feels calm, clear, and comfortable.




✨ **booking your appointment**




all appointments are held with love and intention, and must be booked in advance. a **non-refundable deposit** is required to secure your spot—this ensures your commitment and holds your space in my calendar.




📆 booking is done online or via dm/text.

💫 you must be **18+** for permanent makeup services







🔮 **rescheduling & cancellations**




energy flows, and sometimes plans shift. i kindly ask for **at least 48hrs (2 days!!!)**  if you need to cancel or reschedule.

	•	cancellations within 48 hours will result in loss of your deposit.

	•	no-shows or same-day cancellations may be charged **up to 100%** of the service price and may not be rebooked in the future.

	•	out of respect for both our energies, please communicate with love and honesty if something comes up.







⏳ **late arrivals**




please arrive on time so we can honor your full service. if you’re running late **please provide an eta!** 

	•	i offer a **10-minute grace period**.

	•	after 10 minutes a $15 late fee is applied. 

	•	after 15 minutes your appt is rescheduled & deposit is forfeited










🌙 **refunds & results**




there are **no refunds** on services, as time, energy, and intention are non-returnable.

however, i am always here to make things right within reason. if you have concerns, please reach out & i will do my best to make things right.







💗 **permanent makeup touch-ups**




your pmu journey includes a **healing phase** and one **perfecting touch-up** (typically 6-8 weeks later).

	•	touch-ups outside this window may incur an additional fee.

	•	skipping your touch-up may affect the longevity and final results







🌸 **prep & aftercare**




pre-care and aftercare are essential rituals.







✧ **energy & cleanliness**




please reschedule if you’re feeling unwell—your health and mine are number 1.

conditions like cold sores, lash mites, eye infections, open wounds, or recent cosmetic procedures may prevent service.




if you’re unsure, reach out before booking so we can confirm. 







🌼 **solo sessions**




to preserve the tranquil energy of the studio, **any extra guests & children must be approved beforehand.** this space is your time to relax, recharge, and receive.







🌿 **allergies & patch tests**




if you have any sensitivities or allergies, please let me know when booking.

patch tests are available upon request for lashes, brows, or pigments. if declined, you assume all risk for potential reactions.







💸 **payment & gratitude**




i accept **cash, Zelle, or card** (tap)

gratuity is never expected, greatly appreciated.







📸 **photos & sharing** 




i love capturing photos & videos to showcase my art and energy we’ve created together.

photos/videos may be used on social media unless you request otherwise—







🪬 **respect & alignment** 




i reserve the right to decline services if a client exhibits disrespect, violates policies, or brings unaligned energy into the space. this space is rooted in mutual respect, love, and high vibes.




⸻







thank you for honoring this little sanctuary & container with me. your beauty is more than skin deep, and i am so grateful to hold space for you. i’m grateful for your trust🧿✨




with love & light,

**judylynne | jhausofbeauty**
